description:
Build a website with ease using Weebly - for absolute beginners

Have you thought about starting a website.

Did you have these concerns or doubts:

  • You didn't think you have the technical skills
  • You don't have the money to hire someone to build your site
  • You don't have the time to learn

Well I'm here to tell you that you can learn to build a website using the online website building tool Weebly and it is easy, fun and very cheap. It can even be free if you want.

I can show you how.

Who am I?

Freddie Fulton

I've been in the internet game since the beginning. Yes I'm old. I learned to build websites on my own using tools such as Dreamweaver and Front Page and let me tell you these were not easy to use in the beginning. Currently I use a few different tools to build websites but mainly Wordpress and Weebly. I have used Weebly for years for any clients that want a simple website to manage themselves. There is literally nothing easier for the technologically challenged than Weebly to build and manage websites. That is why my first course on Udemy is:

How to Build a Website using Weebly

The course

I am going to walk you through step by step how to build a website with Weebly. Each step of the way we will visually work through all the steps required to build your site.

You will be shown the following and more:

  • How to sign up
  • How to add content
  • How to add text and images
  • How to integrate social media
  • How to add video
  • How to add a blog
  • How to add eCommerce and a store
  • How to publish your website
  • How to optimize your site for search engines
  • and more

I know this course will provide you with tremendous value, and give you the opportunity to act on your online business ideas and plans. This will open up the world of the internet to you in an easy and cheap way.

What are you waiting for? Start today.
title: How to Build a Website - Using Weebly
